about_the_game:
AUTO-BATTLER VS CHESS

In Kill King, strategy and planning are the key to winning. Kill King includes compelling single player and multiplayer modes, and offers level progression with rewards. Go through an exciting campaign playing against AI or fight one-on-one vs. players from all over the world.

OFFLINE PLAY: Campaign

The centuries-old wars in the human world awakened the ancient evil that began to destroy the kingdoms of people.
People spent their lives killing each other, angry and unable to unite, they became easy prey for the ancient evil. One by one, these kingdoms fell under its attack. Evil knows no mercy, no empathy, evil will not get tired and will not back down, and its food is us...
You are the last of the human kings. You have gathered the strongest of the survived and gone on your final mission to stop evil.
Dive into the world of turn-based strategy, control several warriors at once, anticipate your opponent's moves and get the God of War!

Features:

  • Turn-based battles.
  • More possible combinations than chess and GO combined.
  • Plan your orders and look you how the army executes them.
  • Increase your soldiers' levels and unlock new skills.
  • Every battle is unique.
  • Upgrade your ranking and participate in tournaments with the strongest players in the world.
  • Each season, a new content will be available for the battle against AI.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases

short_description: Participate in a one-on-one battle with other players or fight against AI and complete the first chapter of the campaign. Give orders to your army and watch them fight. Kill King is a fresh look at the world's most popular game - chess. Enjoy the turn-based strategy battle with RPG elements.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, German, French, Polish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
